original_title: Wild About Safety: Timon and Pumbaa Safety Smart Honest and Real!
overview: Timon is upset because he didn't win the Honest & Real Award until Pumbaa teaches him how to have good character by identifying and practicing the three character traits (honesty, kindness, and responsibility) as they prepare for Hilda Hippo's party to honor her for winning
title: Wild About Safety: Timon and Pumbaa Safety Smart Honest and Real!
